title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St slips on impeachment uncertainty
text:
US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St slips on impeachment uncertainty

Stock Markets 54 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 01:40)

© Reuters. US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St slips on impeachment uncertainty NEW YORK, Sept 26 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks slipped on Thursday as the release of a whistleblower report tied to the Democrats' impeachment move against President Donald Trump kept uncertainty high, while trade comments from China's top diplomat helped to limit losses. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 76.26 points, or 0.28%, to 26,894.45, the S&P 500 lost 7 points, or 0.23%, to 2,977.87 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 46.72 points, or 0.58%, to 8,030.66.

US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St slips on impeachment uncertainty
